lead_paragraph: The victory celebration over, new FIFA president Gianni Infantino’s first major decision in charge of the troubled world football organization will be to appoint a secretary general, effectively a chief executive, to run day-to-day operations.

headline.print_headline: Infantino Begins Search for Non-European Chief Exec
headline.main: Infantino Begins Search for Non-European Chief Exec
